Class Base64

A class that can be used to encode Uint8Array to base64 string.

Hierarchy

  • Base64

Index

Methods

  • encode
  • next
  • tripletToBase64

Methods

Static encode

  • encode(dataArray: Uint8Array[]): string
    • Defined in utils/Base64.ts:48

    Encodes an array of Uint8Array to a base64 string, this function is usually used to encode raw image content to a base64 string which can be used to as src of an image object.

    Parameters

    • dataArray: Uint8Array[]

      An array of Uint8Array.

    Returns string

    A encoded based64 string.

Static Private next

  • next(dataArray: Uint8Array[], index: {}): number
    • Defined in utils/Base64.ts:31

    Given an array of Uint8Array object and current position, returns the current uint8 value and move to next position.

    Parameters

    • dataArray: Uint8Array[]

      An array of Uint8Array object.

    • index: {}

      Current position, will be moved to next position after calling this function.

      • [key: string]: number

    Returns number

    The uint8 value of current position.

Static Private tripletToBase64

  • tripletToBase64(num: number): string
    • Defined in utils/Base64.ts:15

    Encodes a 4 bytes integer to a base64 string.

    Parameters

    • num: number

      an integer (4 bytes) to be encoded.

    Returns string

    a encoded base64 string.
